## Learning Objectives

By the end of this discussion, you will be able to:

- use `dnorm()`, `pnorm()`, `qnorm()`, `rnorm()` for Normal distributions.
- use `dexp()`, `pexp()`, `qexp()`, `rexp()` for Normal distributions.
- use `dunif()`, `punif()`, `qunif()`, `runif()` for continous uniform distributions.
